title: RegisterForReflectionITCase, JPAReflectionInGraalITCase, ResourcesITCase, consistent failures
body:
### Describe the bug

TS keep failing consistently:   main, da20f74cb11a2d
```
./mvnw  clean verify -f integration-tests/pom.xml -pl main -Pnative
```
```
[ERROR] Failures: 
[ERROR]   JPAReflectionInGraalITCase.testFieldAndGetterReflectionOnEntityFromServlet:21 1 expectation failed.
Response body doesn't match expectation.
Expected: is "OK"
  Actual: Should not be able to find a non referenced non entity classOK

[ERROR]   RegisterForReflectionITCase.testSelfWithoutNested:21->assertRegistration:56 1 expectation failed.
Response body doesn't match expectation.
Expected: is "FAILED"
  Actual: InnerClassOfA

[ERROR]   RegisterForReflectionITCase.testTargetWithNested:41->assertRegistration:56 1 expectation failed.
Response body doesn't match expectation.
Expected: is "FAILED"
  Actual: ResourceC

[ERROR]   RegisterForReflectionITCase.testTargetWithoutNested:50->assertRegistration:56 1 expectation failed.
Response body doesn't match expectation.
Expected: is "FAILED"
  Actual: ResourceD

[ERROR]   ResourcesITCase.excludedNative:16 1 expectation failed.
Expected status code <404> but was <200>.

[INFO] 
[ERROR] Tests run: 126, Failures: 5, Errors: 0, Skipped: 3
```

I couldn't find it on GH issues as already opened...is this expected?


### Expected behavior

TS passes

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

./mvnw  clean verify -f integration-tests/pom.xml -pl main -Pnative

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux x64

### Output of `java -version`

 (Java Version 11.0.13+8)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

native-image 21.3.0.0-Final Mandrel Distribution (Java Version 11.0.13+8)

### Quarkus version or git rev

da20f74cb11a2d

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvnw

### Additional information

_No response_
